LanguageData.WNA_ShellPsychic.label: psychic blast shell
LanguageData.WNA_ShellPsychic.description: A shell made of bioferrite and enhanced with special techniques. When detonated it can cause a unique psychic phenomena, causing nearby people fall into psychic drunkenness. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_ShellPsychic_Proj.label: psychic blast shell
